description: CalculateRoutes computes routes given the following required parameters: Origin and Destination.

parameters.name: Allow
parameters.description: Features that are allowed while calculating a route. Hot (boolean) --- Allow Hot (High Occupancy Toll) lanes while calculating the route. Default value: false Hov (boolean) --- Allow Hov (High Occupancy vehicle) lanes while calculating the route. Default value: false.

nested_params.name: Hot
nested_params.description: Allow Hot (High Occupancy Toll) lanes while calculating the route. Default value: false.

nested_params.name: Hov
nested_params.description: Allow Hov (High Occupancy vehicle) lanes while calculating the route. Default value: false.

parameters.name: ArrivalTime
parameters.description: Time of arrival at the destination. Time format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ | YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss+hh:mm Examples: 2020-04-22T17:57:24Z 2020-04-22T17:57:24+02:00

parameters.name: Avoid
parameters.description: Features that are avoided while calculating a route. Avoidance is on a best-case basis. If an avoidance can't be satisfied for a particular case, it violates the avoidance and the returned response produces a notice for the violation. Areas (list) --- Areas to be avoided. (dict) --- Areas to be avoided. Except (list) --- Exceptions to the provided avoidance geometry, to be included while calculating the route. (dict) --- Geometry of the area to be avoided. Corridor (dict) --- Geometry defined as a corridor - a LineString with a radius that defines the width of the corridor. An ordered list of positions used to plot a route on a map. (list) --- (float) --- Radius that defines the width of the corridor. BoundingBox (list) --- Geometry defined as a bounding box. The first pair represents the X and Y coordinates (longitude and latitude,) of the southwest corner of the bounding box; the second pair represents the X and Y coordinates (longitude and latitude) of the northeast corner. (float) --- Polygon (list) --- Geometry defined as a polygon with only one linear ring. (list) --- (list) --- (float) --- PolylineCorridor (dict) --- Geometry defined as an encoded corridor - an encoded polyline with a radius that defines the width of the corridor. An ordered list of positions used to plot a route on a map in a lossy compression format. Considers all roads within the provided radius to match the provided destination to. The roads that are considered are determined by the provided Strategy. Unit: Meters PolylinePolygon (list) --- A list of Isoline PolylinePolygon, for each isoline PolylinePolygon, it contains PolylinePolygon of the first linear ring (the outer ring) and from 2nd item to the last item (the inner rings). For more information on polyline encoding, see https://github.com/heremaps/flexiblepolyline/blob/master/README.md. (string) --- Geometry of the area to be avoided. (string) --- CarShuttleTrains (boolean) --- Avoid car-shuttle-trains while calculating the route. ControlledAccessHighways (boolean) --- Avoid controlled access highways while calculating the route. DirtRoads (boolean) --- Avoid dirt roads while calculating the route. Ferries (boolean) --- Avoid ferries while calculating the route. SeasonalClosure (boolean) --- Avoid roads that have seasonal closure while calculating the route. TollRoads (boolean) --- Avoids roads where the specified toll transponders are the only mode of payment. TollTransponders (boolean) --- Avoids roads where the specified toll transponders are the only mode of payment. TruckRoadTypes (list) --- Truck road type identifiers. BK1 through BK4 apply only to Sweden. A2,A4,B2,B4,C,D,ET2,ET4 apply only to Mexico. (string) --- Tunnels (boolean) --- Avoid tunnels while calculating the route. UTurns (boolean) --- Avoid U-turns for calculation on highways and motorways. ZoneCategories (list) --- Zone categories to be avoided. (dict) --- Zone categories to be avoided. Zone category to be avoided.

parameters.name: DepartureTime
parameters.description: Time of departure from thr origin. Time format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ | YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss+hh:mm Examples: 2020-04-22T17:57:24Z 2020-04-22T17:57:24+02:00

parameters.name: Destination
parameters.description: The final position for the route. In the World Geodetic System (WGS 84) format: [longitude, latitude]. (float) ---

parameters.name: DestinationOptions
parameters.description: Destination related options. AvoidActionsForDistance (integer) --- Avoids actions for the provided distance. This is typically to consider for users in moving vehicles who may not have sufficient time to make an action at an origin or a destination. AvoidUTurns (boolean) --- Avoid U-turns for calculation on highways and motorways. Heading (float) --- GPS Heading at the position. Matching (dict) --- Options to configure matching the provided position to the road network. NameHint (string) --- Attempts to match the provided position to a road similar to the provided name. OnRoadThreshold (integer) --- If the distance to a highway/bridge/tunnel/sliproad is within threshold, the waypoint will be snapped to the highway/bridge/tunnel/sliproad. Unit: meters Radius (integer) --- Considers all roads within the provided radius to match the provided destination to. The roads that are considered are determined by the provided Strategy. Unit: Meters Strategy (string) --- Strategy that defines matching of the position onto the road network. MatchAny considers all roads possible, whereas MatchMostSignificantRoad matches to the most significant road. SideOfStreet (dict) --- Options to configure matching the provided position to a side of the street. Position defined as [longitude, latitude]. (float) --- UseWith (string) --- Strategy that defines when the side of street position should be used. Default Value: DividedStreetOnly StopDuration (integer) --- Duration of the stop. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: LegAdditionalFeatures
parameters.description: A list of optional additional parameters such as timezone that can be requested for each result. Elevation: Retrieves the elevation information for each location. Incidents: Provides information on traffic incidents along the route. PassThroughWaypoints: Indicates waypoints that are passed through without stopping. Summary: Returns a summary of the route, including distance and duration. Tolls: Supplies toll cost information along the route. TravelStepInstructions: Provides step-by-step instructions for travel along the route. TruckRoadTypes: Returns information about road types suitable for trucks. TypicalDuration: Gives typical travel duration based on historical data. Zones: Specifies the time zone information for each waypoint. (string) ---

parameters.name: LegGeometryFormat
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the geometry returned for each leg of the route. You can choose between two different geometry encoding formats. FlexiblePolyline: A compact and precise encoding format for the leg geometry. For more information on the format, see the GitHub repository for FlexiblePolyline. Simple: A less compact encoding, which is easier to decode but may be less precise and result in larger payloads.

parameters.name: Tolls
parameters.description: Toll related options. AllTransponders (boolean) --- Specifies if the user has valid transponder with access to all toll systems. This impacts toll calculation, and if true the price with transponders is used. AllVignettes (boolean) --- Specifies if the user has valid vignettes with access for all toll roads. If a user has a vignette for a toll road, then toll cost for that road is omitted since no further payment is necessary. Currency (string) --- Currency code corresponding to the price. This is the same as Currency specified in the request. EmissionType (dict) --- Emission type of the vehicle for toll cost calculation. Valid values: Euro1, Euro2, Euro3, Euro4, Euro5, Euro6, EuroEev Co2EmissionClass (string) --- The CO 2 emission classes. Type of the emission. Valid values: Euro1, Euro2, Euro3, Euro4, Euro5, Euro6, EuroEev VehicleCategory (string) --- Vehicle category for toll cost calculation.

parameters.name: Traffic
parameters.description: Traffic related options. FlowEventThresholdOverride (integer) --- Duration for which flow traffic is considered valid. For this period, the flow traffic is used over historical traffic data. Flow traffic refers to congestion, which changes very quickly. Duration in seconds for which flow traffic event would be considered valid. While flow traffic event is valid it will be used over the historical traffic data. Usage (string) --- Determines if traffic should be used or ignored while calculating the route. Default Value: UseTrafficData.

Default Value: 1 Pedestrian (dict) --- Travel mode options when the provided travel mode is 'Pedestrian' Speed (float) --- Walking speed in Kilometers per hour. Default Value: 1 Truck (dict) --- Travel mode options when the provided travel mode is 'Truck' AxleCount (integer) --- Total number of axles of the vehicle. EngineType (string) --- Engine type of the vehicle. GrossWeight (integer) --- Gross weight of the vehicle including trailers, and goods at capacity. nested_params.name: Strategy
nested_params.description: Strategy that defines matching of the position onto the road network. MatchAny considers all roads possible, whereas MatchMostSignificantRoad matches to the most significant road.

nested_params.name: PassThrough
nested_params.description: If the waypoint should not be treated as a stop. If yes, the waypoint is passed through and doesn't split the route into different legs.

nested_params.name: Position
nested_params.description: Position defined as [longitude, latitude].

nested_params.name: SideOfStreet
nested_params.description: Options to configure matching the provided position to a side of the street.

nested_params.name: Position
nested_params.description: Position defined as [longitude, latitude].

nested_params.name: UseWith
nested_params.description: Strategy that defines when the side of street position should be used. Default Value: DividedStreetOnly.

nested_params.name: StopDuration
nested_params.description: Duration of the stop.

nested_items.name: LegGeometryFormat
nested_items.description: Specifies the format of the geometry returned for each leg of the route.

nested_items.name: Notices
nested_items.description: Notices are additional information returned that indicate issues that occurred during route calculation.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: Code corresponding to the issue.

nested_items.name: Impact
nested_items.description: Impact corresponding to the issue. While Low impact notices can be safely ignored, High impact notices must be evaluated further to determine the impact.

nested_items.name: PricingBucket
nested_items.description: The pricing bucket for which the query is charged at.

nested_items.name: Routes
nested_items.description: The path from the origin to the destination.

nested_items.name: Legs
nested_items.description: A leg is a section of a route from one waypoint to the next. A leg could be of type Vehicle, Pedestrian or Ferry. Legs of different types could occur together within a single route. For example, a car employing the use of a Ferry will contain Vehicle legs corresponding to journey on land, and Ferry legs corresponding to the journey via Ferry.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: Duration of the computed span. This feature doesn't split a span, but is always computed on a span split by other properties.

nested_items.name: DynamicSpeed
nested_items.description: Dynamic speed details corresponding to the span.

nested_items.name: BestCaseSpeed
nested_items.description: Estimated speed while traversing the span without traffic congestion.

nested_items.name: TurnDuration
nested_items.description: Estimated time to turn from this span into the next.

nested_items.name: TypicalSpeed
nested_items.description: Estimated speed while traversing the span under typical traffic congestion.

nested_items.name: FunctionalClassification
nested_items.description: Functional classification of the road segment corresponding to the span.

nested_items.name: Gate
nested_items.description: Attributes corresponding to a gate. The gate is present at the end of the returned span.

nested_items.name: GeometryOffset
nested_items.description: Offset in the leg geometry corresponding to the start of this span.

nested_items.name: Incidents
nested_items.description: Incidents corresponding to the span. These index into the Incidents in the parent Leg.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: Names
nested_items.description: Provides an array of names of the vehicle span in available languages.

nested_items.name: Language
nested_items.description: A list of BCP 47 compliant language codes for the results to be rendered in. The request uses the regional default as the fallback if the requested language can't be provided.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the localized string.

nested_items.name: Notices
nested_items.description: Notices are additional information returned that indicate issues that occurred during route calculation.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: RailwayCrossing
nested_items.description: Attributes corresponding to a railway crossing. The gate is present at the end of the returned span.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: 2-3 letter Region code corresponding to the Span. This is either a province or a state.

nested_items.name: RoadAttributes
nested_items.description: Attributes for the road segment corresponding to the span.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RouteNumbers
nested_items.description: Designated route name or number corresponding to the span.

nested_items.name: Direction
nested_items.description: Directional identifier of the route.

nested_items.name: Language
nested_items.description: List of languages for instructions corresponding to the route number.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The route number.

nested_items.name: ScooterAccess
nested_items.description: Access attributes for a scooter corresponding to the span.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SpeedLimit
nested_items.description: Speed limit details corresponding to the span.

nested_items.name: MaxSpeed
nested_items.description: Maximum speed.

nested_items.name: Unlimited
nested_items.description: If the span doesn't have a speed limit like the Autobahn.

nested_items.name: TollSystems
nested_items.description: Toll systems are authorities that collect payments for the toll.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: TruckAccess
nested_items.description: Access attributes for a truck corresponding to the span.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TruckRoadTypes
nested_items.description: Truck road type identifiers. BK1 through BK4 apply only to Sweden. A2,A4,B2,B4,C,D,ET2,ET4 apply only to Mexico.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: TypicalDuration
nested_items.description: Duration of the computed span under typical traffic congestion.

nested_items.name: Zones
nested_items.description: Zones corresponding to this leg of the route.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: BestCaseDuration
nested_items.description: Total duration in free flowing traffic, which is the best case or shortest duration possible to cover the leg.

nested_items.name: Estimate
nested_items.description: If the price is an estimate or an exact value.

nested_items.name: PerDuration
nested_items.description: Duration for which the price corresponds to.

nested_items.name: Range
nested_items.description: If the price is a range or an exact value. If any of the toll fares making up the route is a range, the overall price is also a range.

nested_items.name: RangeValue
nested_items.description: Price range with a minimum and maximum value, if a range.

nested_items.description: Minimum price.

nested_items.name: Max
